programme.title: برنامج مواهب في تجويد القرآن الكريم
Assir Al Madfoun
programme.desc: A murder case that remained unsolved for 10 years is reopened when the victim's friend reappears and his father points an accusing finger at the long-absent friend.

programme.title: Life Song
programme.desc: Beyram returns to his native Istanbul to reconcile with his close friend, and they agree to marry their children Kerim and Melek when they grow up. Kerim grew up in Germany; but his father forces him to return and marry Melek, but Hulya, Melek's younger sister, wants to marry him.

programme.title: My Home My Destiny
programme.desc: Zeynep is a young law student who finds herself torn between her two mothers. She has been trying for years to equalize the two parties and is appreciative of her mother's genuine sacrifices, but she also works hard to fulfill her mother's other ambitions.

programme.title: Assir Al Madfoun
programme.desc: A murder case that remained unsolved for 10 years is reopened when the victim's friend reappears and his father points an accusing finger at the long-absent friend.

programme.title: Child
programme.desc: In the hopes of giving her baby a better life, Akça, a hooker, is forced to give up her child, who is taken to be brought up by the wealthy Sule, but the situation changes after the latter has a baby of her own.

programme.title: My Siblings
programme.desc: The events of the series revolve around the life and fate of four siblings after the death of their father, as they are forced to struggle in life and face some obstacles in their way.

programme.title: Secrets of an Angel
programme.desc: After years of abuse at the hands of her husband, Cennet phones Zeynep, a lawyer. After his death, he leaves a letter, which turns out to be a criminal complaint, upon which the lives of Cennet's children and Yilmaz will never be the same after that day.

programme.title: Hayet Khassa
programme.desc: The series sheds light on the daily life of Tunisian youth, through the depiction of the everyday lives of college students and the problems they encounter as they graduate and start working, with a focus on the struggles working women face to balance their jobs with their obligations at home.

programme.desc: Your definitive source for news and analysis on the world's second-biggest economy. Hosted by Yvonne Man and David Ingles. Ep1

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: Asia
programme.desc: From Hong Kong, the most important global business and breaking markets news information as it happens.

programme.title: Bloomberg Daybreak: Middle East & Africa
programme.desc: Live from Dubai, we bring you the latest global markets and analysis, plus news-making interviews, with a special focus on MEA.

programme.title: Bloomberg Daybreak: Europe
programme.desc: Live from London, we catch you up with overnight markets news from the US and Asia. Plus, we'll tell you what matters for investors in Europe, giving you insight before trading begins.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: Today
programme.desc: Everything you need to know as markets open across Europe. From our London HQ, Anna Edwards, Kriti Gupta and Guy Johnson break down the biggest stories of the day and speak to special guests. Ep1

programme.title: The Pulse with Francine Lacqua
programme.desc: Conversations with high profile guests in the beating heart of global business, finance and politics. We go wherever the story is, bringing you exclusive interviews and market-moving scoops. Ep1

programme.title: Bloomberg Brief
programme.desc: Delivering the market news, data and analysis you need to set your agenda.

programme.title: Bloomberg Surveillance

programme.title: Bloomberg: The Open
programme.desc: Jonathan Ferro hosts this programme showcasing the most insightful and informative Bloomberg charts to help position a global audience for the trading day.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets
programme.desc: Bloomberg Markets is focused on bringing you the most important global business and breaking markets news and information as it happens.

programme.title: Bloomberg Technology
programme.desc: The only daily news programme focused exclusively on technology, innovation and the future of business. Hosted by Ed Ludlow from San Francisco and Caroline Hyde in New York.

programme.title: Bloomberg Crypto
programme.desc: Bloomberg Crypto covers the people, transactions, and technology shaping decentralised finance. Your weekly source for the latest news, analysis and interviews with the most influential stakeholders.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets
programme.desc: Bloomberg Markets is focused on bringing you the most important global business and breaking markets news and information as it happens.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: Balance of Power

programme.title: Bloomberg BusinessWeek

programme.title: The Powerpuff Girls
programme.desc: Armed with their superpowers and extra cuteness, Blossom, Bubbles, and Buttercup continue to save the day from all the evil plans the bad guys are intending for Townsville.

programme.title: Ekans - Snakes Awake
programme.desc: The events revolve around a smart thirteen-year-old boy named Ekans, who acquires a supernatural power that gives him the ability to control snakes. Using modern technology, he is able to confront villains and keep his city safe.

programme.desc: Set in the city of Elmore, where the 12-year-old cat Gumball engages in many adventures with the help of his dear friend Darwin, his pet goldfish that has grown legs and became a member of the Watterson family.

programme.title: Al Kha'en
programme.desc: Dr. Aseel's ideal life is shattered when she discovers that her husband Seif has been cheating on her for two years with a woman fifteen years younger than him, which prompts her to take the path of revenge.

programme.desc: A Saudi sports program presented by the broadcaster Mustafa Agha, in which he covers and analyzes matches and sporting events for Saudi, Arab, and international football.

programme.title: Mojamma' 75
programme.desc: The story of five families residing in an upscale residential complex in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, and the intertwined relationships between them, shedding light on the challenges, dreams, and values of Saudi youth.

programme.title: Wild Heart
programme.desc: Yaman got kidnapped from his family when he was young and grew up on the streets with his friends. They face many challenges, but everything changes in his life after meeting Rüya.

programme.title: Sit Al Hosn
programme.desc: To maintain her work in the field of alternative medicine, a woman in her forties named Sit Al Hosn employs an unorthodox solution that coincides with a string of strange disappearances in the area.

programme.desc: Media personality Hend Salem tries to advance further in her work by seeking to host a well-known figure; however, she gets involved in a big case that reveals a lot about her past and the existence of an old love story with this celebrity.

programme.title: El Nar Bel Nar
programme.desc: Maryam, a Syrian schoolteacher who migrated to Lebanon and became a bread seller, is forced to deal with Omran, a Syrian-Lebanese troublemaking money-lender. programme.title: Al Thaman
programme.desc: The widow Sarah resorts to her only remaining option to cover the costs of her son Ibrahim's cancer treatment, so she agrees to spend one night with the manager of the company, Zain, in return for an amount of money.

programme.title: Prova
programme.desc: Majid is a young headmaster in a private school, seeking to make some changes at his school, and his life as well; he has no idea that his wish will come true when he bumps into Layal, who works as a dog trainer and a musician in a restaurant.

programme.title: Prisoner
programme.desc: Firat is an accomplished federal prosecutor. As he loses his memory and ends up imprisoned after he gets charged with killing his wife and daughter, he must break out of prison in order to find out the truth.

programme.title: Golden Boy S2
programme.desc: In the second season, Ferit is urgently brought to Istanbul after he was shot, and Seyran remains by his side, as the surgery he will undergo is fraught with risks. Hatice meets with Saffet Aga and Halis Aga to prevent further chaos and the closure of Saffet Aga's case.

programme.title: Dirty Laundry
programme.desc: The lives of the wealthiest and most influential families in Istanbul, and their maids frequently become a part of their stories after being exposed to the mysteries, secrets, and murders kept behind closed doors.

programme.title: Love By Force (Ep269)
programme.desc: Bollywood, Romance, Drama 2009 Naitik and Akshara are forced to marry, while love brings Kartik and Naira together, revealing the difference between love-based relationships and forced marriage. Hina Khan, Karan Mehra, Ayush Agarwal, Shivangi Joshi, Mohsin Khan, Romesh Kalra, Zama Habib

programme.title: Woh Toh Hai Albela (Ep171)
programme.desc: Bollywood, Romance, Drama 2022 Two brothers are tangled in a love triangle when one of them marries the lover of the other which complicates the lives of the three of them and they endeavor to get out of this trouble. Shaheer Shiekh, Hiba Nawab, Pallavi Pradhan, Jharna Narwani, Kinshuk Vaidya, Romesh Kalra, Manali Karia

programme.title: Woh Toh Hai Albelaa
programme.desc: The story follows Krishna, a cheerful guy who loves his two brothers and always stands by them, especially his older brother Chiranjeev, then his life turns upside down when circumstances force him to marry Chiranjeev's sweetheart.

programme.title: Heropanti
programme.desc: Romance, Action, Bollywood 2014 An impossible love story between Pablo and Dempis that stands in the face of ancient traditions and terrorism that threatens their lives and their city. Tiger Shroff, Kriti Sanon, Parthaa Akerkar, Anuradha Chandan, Sunil Grover, Sabir Khan, Sanjeev Dutta

programme.title: Romeo Akbar Walter
programme.desc: The film follows the Indian banker Romeo who gets recruited by the Research and Analysis Wing to work as a spy for India, as he goes for a covert operation in Pakistan prior to the Indo-Pakistani War in 1971.

programme.title: Pyaar Ka Punchnama 2
programme.desc: Romance, Drama, Comedy 2015 Three bachelors decide to change their lifestyle completely when they found out the true love does really worth it all. Kartik Aaryan, Sunny Singh Nijjar, Sonalli Sehgal, Omkar Kapoor, Nushrratt Bharuccha, Luv Ranjan, Luv Ranjan

programme.title: Saheb Biwi Aur Gangster Returns
programme.desc: Grappling with both the physical pain of his disability and the emotional pain of his wife's betrayal, Aditya's struggles intensify by an old feud between his ancestors and the family of Indrajeet Singh. A portrayal of war over power, revenge, and whether love could suffice to bring peace.

programme.title: Gulabo Sitabo
programme.desc: Comedy, Drama, Bollywood 2020 Mirza is an old man who owns a house, is always at war with his tenant Baankey as he wants him to evict his house because he never pay his rental fees but Baankey is hell-bent on staying. Amitabh Bachchan, Ayushmann Khurrana, Vijay Raaz, Srishti Shrivastava, Farrukh Jaffar, Shoojit Sircar, Juhi Chaturvedi

programme.title: Guzzarish
programme.desc: Romance, Drama, Bollywood 2010 A retired paralyzed famous Indian magician, who is depending completely on his nurse, files a lawsuit to the court for mercy killing. Hrithik Roshan

programme.title: Arbeeny Fy el Eshreen

He finds himself at a crossroads, either to continue alone or to defend his previous life and recover it, whatever the consequences are.

programme.title: Nassibi w Esmetek 4
programme.desc: An anthology series of various tales from everyday life, including the story, "The White Eyeglasses", that follows Fakhr, who invents a pair of glasses that, when worn, can tell you how others truly feel about you underneath the lies and niceties.

programme.title: Udaariyaan
programme.desc: Sandhu's family comes from a small village in Punjab; however, as the daughter Jasmine dreams of immigrating to Canada, the dreams of the two sisters Tejo and Jasmine soon change when fate brings them a different reality.

programme.title: Zelzal
programme.desc: Harbi buys a house in installments from Khalil who refuses to register the house in Harbi's name after he completes the payment. When the earthquake of 1992 happens, Harbi dies. programme.title: Al-Heiba Al-Awda
programme.desc: When Jabal's father is murdered, the blood feud sends his family and the Al-Sa'eid family into a cycle of violence and tribal conflicts, as those who have unfinished business with Jabal's father appear to complicate things for Jabal.

programme.desc: Sandhu's family comes from a small village in Punjab; however, as the daughter Jasmine dreams of immigrating to Canada, the dreams of the two sisters Tejo and Jasmine soon change when fate brings them a different reality.

programme.title: Al-Heiba Al-Awda
programme.desc: When Jabal's father is murdered, the blood feud sends his family and the Al-Sa'eid family into a cycle of violence and tribal conflicts, as those who have unfinished business with Jabal's father appear to complicate things for Jabal.

programme.title: Zelzal
programme.desc: Harbi buys a house in installments from Khalil who refuses to register the house in Harbi's name after he completes the payment. When the earthquake of 1992 happens, Harbi dies. Khalil refuses to hand over the land to the heirs and clashes with Harbi's son, Mohamed, who loves Khalil's daughter.
